website_summaries.verdict: An impact-ready tap and drill set that is an excellent choice for mechanics, electricians and other professionals.
pros: Features a 1/4" hex shank for use in impact drivers
Allows you to drill, tap and countersink all in one step
Capable of working with up to 1/4" thick materials
Delivers tremendous durability and value in comparison to similar tap and drill sets
cons: Requires the use of specialized equipment for sharpening

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of always drilling a hole then having to get the tap and die set out. I build lots of project out of steel, and decided to try these. Let me just say I'm sold, it's a great product. At 1st I figured that I would break them, but I was wrong, prefect threads.
customer_reviews.author: Taskman

customer_reviews.title: Got to have it
customer_reviews.text: No more using a drill to drill the hole and then tapping it out later. All in one and works great......make sure to take your time and don't try to just blow through it, they aren't indestructible but they work great!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Clement

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly sharp
customer_reviews.text: i tried so many drill bits before but never ones that pass trough metal so easy as this ones, and no one is broke so far, also the size was important for the specific project that was doing and it becomes my favorite now.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver, 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: These are very handy to have if you fabricate a lot. I use the in aluminum, and plastic. I'd use them in steel, but haven't found the need. These drill a hole, then thread it to the appropriate size immediately following the drill bit part. So it's a 2-fer, it definitely saves a lot of time from switching bits. They're sharp, and easy to use. Go slow, once the tap is doing it's thing, you can strip the threads by bottoming it out. Go slow, but if you looking at this, you know what yer doing. I'd recommend them for a bunch of reasons, not a grape bunch, more like a banana bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Psychofisherman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: What a time saver. Just works and does it fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: I expected to be larger size. It's too small, however, I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser6801

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Dulled on a simple job on the first use. Complete trash.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The description seems to indicate 5 pcs 1/4-20 drill & Tap
customer_reviews.text: In fact, only one bit is 1/4" the other 4 are four different sizes. I'm sure they are fine, but what I needed was 5 bits of 1/4-20. The reality is, I just didn't read down far enough, the description says later that it does have 5 different sizes, it is just the headline that leads you to believe it is a pack of 5 pcs 1/4"-20 drill taps.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin and soft metal
customer_reviews.text: Super for sheet metal or aluminum up to 3?16" thick for drilling and tapping in one step.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t bend under interrogation🤣
customer_reviews.text: The drilling went well and they didn’t bend under pressure😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will break on soft steel with impact
customer_reviews.text: Went to tap 1/8 inch soft steel and the tap snapped in half the first time I used it, had to drill out broken piece, not impact ready....
customer_reviews.author: jim weister

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it in any thick metal but it works great in 1/8 thick metal.
customer_reviews.author: W. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel approved
customer_reviews.text: These little fellas held up strong against a stainless steel railing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are lacking and description is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: They provide no images of the packages or list of the bit sizes. Only that they are Metric. These are not Metric they are SAE
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B

customer_reviews.title: Weak bits
customer_reviews.text: Broke two bits in one use . Using lub-oil and take precautions
customer_reviews.author: Milla Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea, didn't last long under easy use.
customer_reviews.text: The smallest broke after drilling about 8 holes but the larger made it though 5 before it snapped. Both were drilling a piece of 1/8 inch plate in a vice holding it squared. The larger bit had to be resharpend after about 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: FireFly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Used 1 time and started drilling thru the 1/8 Aluminum and snapped a bit things are junk not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Idiot proof and excellent for drill-less impact driver fiends
customer_reviews.text: These are also available locally as singles, and are a great product for one who uses an impact driver to fill the role of drill. I picked up the common 10-24 size on my way to an emergency repair call for a hopelessly abused and mangled escape room fixture. It worked every time without a flaw, prep, or oil, and backs out without destroying threads even when in a hurry and less than careful. The resulting threads were perfect and easy to hand-start and tighten screws and the bit/tap looks like new still.
customer_reviews.author: Flandry

product_meta.title: DEWALT Drill Tap Set, Impact Ready, 1/4-Inch, 5-Piece (DWADTQTR5SET)
product_meta.description: DEWALT DWADTQTR5SET Impact Ready® 5pc Drill Tap Set 1/4" Capacity features a 1/4" hex shank for use in impact drivers. This item allows you to drill, tap, and countersink all in one step; capable of working with up to 1/4" thick material capacity. Commonly used by Elevator Installers, Mechanicals, Electricians, Glaziers. Includes: (1) 8-32 UNC, (1) 10-24 UNC, (1) 10-32 UNF, (1) 12-24 UNC, (1) 1/4"-20 UNC.
feature_bullets: Features a 1/4" hex shank for use in impact drivers
Drill, tap, and countersink all in one step

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
